alert.note: Alert for Monroe (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 6:49PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Alleghany County in west central Virginia, northeastern Giles and Craig Counties in southwestern Virginia, northwestern Botetourt County in west central Virginia, northwestern Montgomery County in southwestern Virginia and southeastern Monroe Counties in southeastern West Virginia and the City of Covington through 715 PM EST... At 647 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Huffman, or near Mountain Lake, moving northeast at 100 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blacksburg... Covington... Clifton Forge... Pembroke... New Castle... Newport... and Paint Bank. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Additional statements will be issued as conditions warrant.
